titleStmt.title: The abridgment of Camden's Brita[n]nia with the maps of the seuerall shires of England and Wales.
Britannia. English. Abridgments
titleStmt.author: Camden, William, 1551-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Bill printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,
